title: Bozeman, Montana
summary: Bozeman is a city and the county seat of Gallatin County, Montana, United States. Located in southwest Montana, the 2020 census put Bozeman's population at 53,293, making it the fourth-largest city in Montana.[5] It is the principal city of the Bozeman, MT Micropolitan Statistical Area, consisting of all of Gallatin County with a population of 118,960.[6] Due to the fast growth rate Bozeman is expected to be upgraded to Montana's fourth metropolitan area.[7] It is the largest micropolitan statistical area in Montana, the fastest growing micropolitan statistical area in the United States in 2018, 2019 and 2020,[8] as well as the third-largest of all Montana's statistical areas.[9][10]
